channel.title: Hcaptcha on SoByte
channel.description: Recent content in Hcaptcha on SoByte

item.title: Hacking HCaptcha through simulated clicks
item.description: In the previous article we introduced ReCaptcha’s mock click crack tutorial, but in addition to ReCaptcha, there is another CAPTCHA that is very similar to ReCapacha’s verification process, called HCaptcha. ReCaptcha is Google’s, for some reason, we can not use ReCaptcha in China, so sometimes HCaptcha has become a better choice for some international sites. So today we’ll learn about HCaptcha and its simulated click cracking process. HCaptcha Let’s first
